name: The Ruins of Sarcopha Gus
description:
The Ruins of Sarcopha Gus is a game developed by Zahydee Machado and Kaden Kilburg at Iowa State University's 2018 Game Jam. This means it was made in 48 hours, and it will likely not be updated unless requested.

Controls involve right and left mouse clicks along with an optional tab button. A mouse is recommended.

Significant bugs:

  • Walking through walls on first level
  • Exit not triggering on level 5
  • Oddly being rebounded/pushed across the room
  • Bird pot hitbox not responding to melee attacks
